video.title: Mighty Machines
video.synopsis: Take a kid-friendly look at the nuts and bolts of mechanical marvels, such as jumbo jets, sky cranes, working boats, 18-wheelers and fire trucks.

episodes.synopsis: Grapples and shear tractors knock down a brick factory after dynamite blows up the giant smokestack. Bulldozers and front-end loaders pack metal onto trucks to haul it to the steelworks.
episodes.title: At the Demolition Site

episodes.synopsis: Front-end loaders scoop up rock after the blasting and fill up the huge Euclid trucks. A giant crusher grinds up the rock and conveyors carry it to the storage yard to be loaded onto gravel trucks.
episodes.title: At the Quarry

episodes.synopsis: Engines shunt cars around in the yard to make up a train that will travel across the country. Cars are connected together, brake lines hooked up, automobiles unloaded from special bi-level cars and freight cars emptied at a truck depot.
episodes.title: At the Train Yard!

episodes.synopsis: Big commercial planes get checked over in the hanger before they are loaded with baggage, receive catering supplies, get filled with jet fuel and are pushed back from their gate. A busy day at the international airport.
episodes.title: At the Airport!

episodes.synopsis: Gravel trucks deliver crushed stone and sand to make the concrete that is mixed in the cement trucks. Concrete pours out of the trucks to make sidewalks and foundations for streetcar tracks.
episodes.title: At the Cement Yard!

episodes.synopsis: Giant 18-wheelers carry race cars to the big race. Special equipment prepares the cars for the race. In the pit stops, tires are changed, gas gets topped up, and the cars head back out to scream around the track.
episodes.title: At the Race Track!

episodes.synopsis: City garbage trucks pick up the trash from the curb and deliver it to the transfer station where it's rammed into special trucks to go to the landfill. Enormous tractors roll and compact the garbage before it gets covered with dirt.
episodes.title: At the Garbage Dump!

episodes.synopsis: The police boat patrols the harbor and greets all the ferry boats, the little sailboats, the fireboat and the visiting cargo ships. Even the tall ships come to visit.
episodes.title: In the Harbour!

episodes.synopsis: Huge shovels dig foundations, bulldozers smooth the ground, cranes lift curtain walls and air conditioning units at the site of two city hospitals.
episodes.title: At the Construction Site!

episodes.synopsis: Street sweepers, street washers, storm sewer vacuums, tree trimmers and stump grinders work to keep the city clean and green.
episodes.title: In the City!

episodes.synopsis: All the parts of a fire truck are explored and explained as the firemen practice a drill, hooking up to the hydrant and testing their aerial spraying platform.
episodes.title: At the Fire Hall!

episodes.synopsis: A shiny red 18-wheeler transport truck starts its day with a visit to the truck stop to gas up before it heads out on the highway. At the produce warehouse, workers pack a load of carrots onto the big trailer.
episodes.title: On the Road!

episodes.synopsis: It's been snowing all night and the snow removal crew is working hard to clear the streets. Blower gobbles up the piles of snow.
episodes.title: In the Snowstorm!

episodes.synopsis: Out on the snow-covered ski hills, Groomer is ensuring the slopes are in top condition for all the skiers who want to enjoy winter fun.
episodes.title: At the Ski Hill

episodes.synopsis: Feller is busy cutting timber. He is a strange-looking machine that lumbers along on his tracks until he finds a tree that he likes.
episodes.title: In the Forest

episodes.synopsis: Jaws, the front-end loader with a set of jaws for lifting logs, knows how trees are turned into lumber, and he takes us on a tour of the sawmill.
episodes.title: At the Sawmill

episodes.synopsis: Down, down, down deep into the earth we go to see what it's like in a salt mine. Ranger, a shiny white jeep, tootles along the dark roads.
episodes.title: Deep Underground

episodes.synopsis: Where does all of the stuff you put in the recycling bins go when the big trucks pick it up from your street? Come and see.
episodes.title: All About Recycling

episodes.synopsis: Today is Green Truck's birthday, and he wants to show you how he was built. Inside the truck assembly plant, there are hoists and forklift trucks.
episodes.title: Building a Truck

episodes.synopsis: Come fly through the sky with Stearman, the coolest biplane ever, to visit the air show. All of Stearman's friends have joined him at the show.
episodes.title: In the Sky

episodes.synopsis: Buddy the Bus shows us how he and all the other transit vehicles get people to work and school.
episodes.title: Subways, Buses and Trains!

episodes.synopsis: Skipper, the little blue workboat, lives in the ocean port and takes us on a tour to meet some of the huge ships that have come in from the sea.
episodes.title: Making Waves

episodes.synopsis: Today, Sambro, the coast guard lifeboat, is showing Zodiac how his powerful engines make him zoom through the water.
episodes.title: To the Rescue

episodes.synopsis: Dig it out over here, pile it up over there. Sammy, the big orange shovel, is filling up all dump trucks as she digs the dirt for the new highway.
episodes.title: Making a Road

episodes.synopsis: Tractors are the workhorses of farms. Allis Tractor and Polly the Plough make easy work of a big field -- they can plough six furrows at a time.
episodes.title: On the Farm

episodes.synopsis: Trucks of all descriptions are wheeling into the truck stop to fill up with fuel. Flying J, the fuel tanker, sees lots of transport trucks.
episodes.title: Trucks, Trucks, Trucks

episodes.synopsis: A jet airplane is one of the fastest machines on the planet. Have you ever seen one being made?
episodes.title: Building an Airplane (MM3-1601)

episodes.synopsis: It's not easy for Backhoe to dig a tidy trench, and Bulldozer has a difficult time building an earth ramp.
episodes.title: Machines Go to School

episodes.synopsis: A field of tomatoes may be vast, but Harvester can handle it.
episodes.title: Bringing in the Harvest

episodes.synopsis: Atlantis dives under the waves, taking tourists to the reef to see beautiful coral, exotic fish and shipwrecks.
episodes.title: Under the Waves

episodes.synopsis: Railways in the mountains have to be specially built, and this railway was built during the gold rush, more than 100 years ago.
episodes.title: Ride the Mountain Rails!

episodes.synopsis: A hovercraft is a very unusual boat propelled by big fans that blow downward, making it float on a cushion of air.
episodes.title: Go, Boats, Go!

episodes.synopsis: Stretch is a crane, and his job is to lift things onto the top of very high buildings.
episodes.title: Reach for the Sky!

episodes.synopsis: Making steel is complicated, but Slab Hauler knows everyone at the steel mill and has offered to take us on a tour.
episodes.title: At the Steel Mill

episodes.synopsis: The Spirit of Vancouver Island picks up passengers, cars and trucks at the dock. With a long whistle, he's on his way.
episodes.title: Board the Ferry!

episodes.synopsis: Forks, the big front-end loader, takes cars to be stripped, then feeds them into Big Mouth, a machine that squashes cars as flat as pancakes.
episodes.title: Car Wreckers

episodes.synopsis: Ever wonder how a newspaper is made? Charlie, the printing press, is three stories high and as long as a city block.
episodes.title: Hot off the Press!

episodes.synopsis: Tow trucks are a special type of machine because they help other machines get out of trouble.
episodes.title: Giant Tow Trucks

episodes.synopsis: Pipelines carrying oil, gas and other petroleum products are buried underground all over the world.
episodes.title: Laying Down the Pipeline
